title: Episode 152: The Murdaugh Family Murders - Part 2
description:
With a string of deadly incidents in their wake, members of a powerful Lowcountry family suddenly found themselves searching for justice. Two brutal slayings, a rain-soaked crime scene, and several possible motives. Authorities are only releasing new information in tiny increments causing speculation to run rampant. With the solicitor in charge finally recusing himself due to conflicts, does that point to a possible development?
